text: The Ministry of Defense (; MINDEF) is an agency of the Government of Argentina that assists and advises the President of the Argentine Nation in everything related to national defense and the Armed Forces. It was created on June 13, 1958 with the promulgation of the Law of the National Congress called "Ministries" which was taken from the antecedent of the Ministry of Defense that Juan Domingo Per√≥n had created and that was suppressed in 1954. The current Minister of Defense is Luis Petri, appointed by President Javier Milei on December 10, 2023. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Joint chiefs off Staff Category:Government ministries of Argentina
